basic_data.human_name: Humble Comics Bundle: The Ultimate Terry Moore Collection by Abstract Studios Encore 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Discover some of comics’ most indelible characters in the universe of Eisner Award–winning artist & writer Terry Moore! Get caught up in the lives of Katchoo, Francine, and David in the complete run of the groundbreaking series Strangers in Paradise. Meet Julie, whose life changes forever when liquid metal rains from the sky in Echo. Unravel the mystery of a woman who wakes up in her own grave in Rachel Rising. Plus, your purchase helps support The Hero Initiative!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Tales of love, murder, and hi-tech battle suits
basic_data.description:
Tales of love, murder, and hi-tech battle suits. Discover some of comics’ most indelible characters in the universe of Eisner Award–winning artist & writer Terry Moore! Get caught up in the lives of Katchoo, Francine, and David in the complete run of the groundbreaking series Strangers in Paradise. Meet Julie, whose life changes forever when liquid metal rains from the sky in Echo. Unravel the mystery of a woman who wakes up in her own grave in Rachel Rising. Plus, your purchase helps support The Hero Initiative!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the comics in this bundle is as much as $717. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The comics in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and The Hero Iinitiative via PayPal Giving Fund. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

sipkids.description_text: The characters of Strangers In Paradise return as 8 year olds in this G-Rated collection of stories for every season. Katchoo, Francine, Freddie.. they’re all here as kids playing soccer, crashing birthday parties, skiing and trick-or-treating. This one is for the kid in all of us.

rachelrisingv4_wintergraves.description_text: Rachel search for the person who murdered her is aided by Zoe, a 10 year old serial killer fighting her own demons.

rachelrisingv6_secretskept.description_text: The body count rises in Manson as Lilith reconnects with Rachel and reveals a wicked undercurrent.

strangersinparadisev15_tomorrownow.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V15: Tomorrow Now
strangersinparadisev15_tomorrownow.description_text: Francine got everything she wanted except Katchoo. Is it enough? Meanwhile Katchoo builds a new life with her art.

strangersinparadisev8_myotherlife.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V8: My Other Life
strangersinparadisev8_myotherlife.description_text: A terrifying plane crash forces Katchoo to accept an offer she cannot refuse.

rachelrisingv7_dusttodust.human_name: Rachel Rising V7: Dust to Dust
rachelrisingv7_dusttodust.description_text: Rachel and Jet should be dead, so why are they still here looking gorgeous? Zoe suggests the answer is Lilith.

echov1_moonlake.description_text: An explosion in the sky rains down liquid metal on Julie that begins to form an armor. When the military comes to retrieve it, the armor strikes back and forces Julie to run for her life.

fiveyearsv2_stalemate.description_text: Katchoo’s trip to Russia falls short of expectations when she encounters a dangerous assassin. Meanwhile Stephanie recovers half of the ancient scroll only to discover the author wants it back! Can anyone stop the clock and bring the nuclear game to a stalemate?!

motorgirlv2_nomanleftbehind.human_name: Motor Girl V2: No Man Left Behind
motorgirlv2_nomanleftbehind.description_text: Sam’s wartime experience haunts her as she fights to keep a grip on reality while saving the little E.T. BiK. Aunt Libby knows Sam needs a life saving operation ASAP but getting the vet to cooperate proves impossible until she finishes one last mission.

strangersinparadisev11_bravenewworld.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V11: Brave New World
strangersinparadisev11_bravenewworld.description_text: Katchoo and Francine finally talk openly about their relationship. Meanwhile David returns to Japan with Tambi on his trail.

strangersinparadisev2_idreamofyou.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V2: I Dream of You
strangersinparadisev2_idreamofyou.description_text: Katchoo’s wicked past tracks her down and threatens to destroy her new life with Francine. Meet Darcy Parker.

fiveyearsv1_fireinthesky.human_name: Five Years V1: Fire in the Sky
fiveyearsv1_fireinthesky.description_text: The Terryverse comes together to stop the rise of an apocalyptic device hailed as The Last Bomb. With a collider test scheduled in 5 years, Tambi recruits Katchoo, Rachel and Zoe to help track down the scientists involved.

rachelrisingv5_nightcometh.description_text: Rachel and Jet attempt to stop the mother of all witches from destroying their town while Zoe negotiates a deal with the demon Malus.

ever_thewayout.description_text: Everly is a street smart 17 year old when she meets the angel Timothy, who claims she will fulfill an ancient prophecy on her 18th birthday. When Ever finds out this means sacrificing herself to the Pit Of Darkness, she refuses. Enter Samuel, a mysterious angel who changes Ever’s life forever.

strangersinparadisev17_tattoo.description_text: Katchoo and David visit Casey in Las Vegas while Francine is haunted by the one she left behind.

strangersinparadisev7_sanctuary.description_text: Serious differences separate Katchoo and Francine while Casey proves to be an unstoppable force of friendship.

echov4_collider.description_text: Julie learns the volatile alloy she wears is meant for a much larger project, one she now knows will destroy everything.

strangersinparadisev3_itsagoodlife.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V3: It's a Good Life
strangersinparadisev3_itsagoodlife.description_text: Davis has some explaining to do while Freddie’s rebound girlfriend makes a splash. Meet Casey.

echov3_desertrun.description_text: A madman chases Julie across the desert as she and Dillon begin to learn what her body armor really is.

theheroinitiative.description_text:
Donations to support The Hero Initiative are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Hero Initiative is the first-ever federally chartered not-for-profit corporation dedicated strictly to helping comic book artists and craftsmen in need. Hero Initiative creates a financial safety net for yesterday's creators who may need emergency medical aid, financial support for essentials of life, and an avenue back into paying work. It's a chance for all of us to give back something to the people who have given us so much enjoyment.

Since its inception, The Hero Initiative has had the good fortune to grant over $700,000 to the comics veterans who have paved the way for those in the industry today.

strangersinparadisev14_davidsstory.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V14: David's Story
strangersinparadisev14_davidsstory.description_text: Born into a powerful crime family, David and sister Darcy forge two very paths, one leads to power, the other to love.

echov2_atomicdreams.description_text: Julie is leaving a trail of bodies in her wake with NSB agent Ivy hot tracking her every clue. Is Julie responsible for the gruesome deaths or is there another person with the hi-tech armor?

strangersinparadisexxvv2_hideandseek.human_name: Strangers in Paradise XXV V2: Hide and Seek
strangersinparadisexxvv2_hideandseek.description_text: Katchoo’s search for Stephanie uncovers rogue Parker Girl’s connection to a much larger threat, the bomb to end all bombs, made possible by an ancient scroll written by Lilith in 4,000 B.C.!

strangersinparadisexxvv1_thechase.human_name: Strangers in Paradise XXV V1: The Chase
strangersinparadisexxvv1_thechase.description_text: When Stephanie, one of Darcy Parker’s spies, is caught in Washington D.C. she agrees to tell a senate committee everything, then disappears. Tambi convinces Katchoo to join the global search for Stephanie and stop her at all costs.

serialv1_theglasstomb.description_text: Zoe has been 10 years old for 50 years, thanks to a demon who possessed her and turned her into a serial killer. When a childhood friend is murdered, Zoe is determined to find the killer before the police in order to revenge her friend.

rachelrisingv3_cemeterysongs.description_text: Lilith reveals her true identity to Rachel who has secrets of her own.

strangersinparadisev19_everafter.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V19: Ever After
strangersinparadisev19_everafter.description_text: Faced with losing David, Katchoo comes up with a shocking plan of action. Francine comes back to Katchoo but is she too late?

echov6_thelastday.description_text: Julie and friends do everything possible to stop a military attempt to create a black hole in their super-collider.

serialv2_catandmouse.description_text: Zoe stays one step ahead of the police, using all her expertise to track down the clever serial killer named Jenni. But finding Jenni is one thing, stopping her is another!

terrymoores2021sketchbook.description_text: 108 pages of beautiful sketches and portraits of Moore’s characters from his most popular titles.

strangersinparadisev1_thecollectedstrang.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V1: The Collected Strangers In Paradise
strangersinparadisev1_thecollectedstrang.description_text: David loves Katchoo but Katchoo loves Francine but Francine loves Freddie. Get ready to rumble!

rachelrisingv2_fearnomalus.human_name: Rachel Rising V2: Fear No Malus
rachelrisingv2_fearnomalus.description_text: Rachel and Lilith join forces to fight Zoe’s demon, Malus. Rachel finally is able to confront her own killer.

strangersinparadisev4_lovemetender.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V4: Love Me Tender
strangersinparadisev4_lovemetender.description_text: Katchoo and Francine’s rocky relationship heats up, despite a new threat, Veronica.

strangersinparadisev5_immortalenemies.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V5: Immortal Enemies
strangersinparadisev5_immortalenemies.description_text: Katchoo returns to Darcy to finish what she started while Francine learns the truth about Katchoo’s past.

rachelrisingv1_theshadowofdeath.human_name: Rachel Rising V1: The Shadow of Death
rachelrisingv1_theshadowofdeath.description_text: Rachel wakes up in a grave in the woods outside small town Manson. Her search for answers uncovers a creepy town where everyone is a suspect.

strangersinparadisev18_loveandlies.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V18: Love and Lies
strangersinparadisev18_loveandlies.description_text: When David’s health becomes a serious issue, he and Casey devise a plan to reunite Francine and Katchoo.

strangersinparadisev6_highschool.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V6: High School
strangersinparadisev6_highschool.description_text: Francine and Katchoo meet and form a lifelong bond in high school. Bonus short story: Princess Warrior!

motorgirlv1_reallife.description_text: A UFO crashes into the junkyard, of war vet Samantha. With her imaginary friend Mike by her side, Sam repairs the ship but now E.T. “BiK” has a crush on her. Not sure what is or isn’t real, Sam struggles with PTSD to fend off a contractor determined to blast Its out of the sky.

strangersinparadisev12_heartinhand.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V12: Heart In Hand
strangersinparadisev12_heartinhand.description_text: The bond between Francine and Katchoo prepares to go to a new level as an ex-Parker Girl targets Katchoo.

25thanniversarysketchbook.description_text: Over the years Moore has produced a vast amount of sketches and designs, most of which feature the strong female character from his books. This beautiful collection offers and inside look at the artist and his work.

terrymooreshowtodrawexpandedversion.human_name: Terry Moore's How to Draw Expanded Version
terrymooreshowtodrawexpandedversion.description_text: The secrets of drawing the female form, expressions, beauty, funny, body language and comic timing are all just a few of the subjects discussed in Moore’s book, drawing on 25 years of experience in the comic book business. A must have for anyone aspiring to master the art of comic storytelling.

strangersinparadisev10_tropicofdesire.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V10: Tropic of Desire
strangersinparadisev10_tropicofdesire.description_text: David secretly struggles with his health while Francine begins to see life with Katchoo in a new light.

echov5_blackhole.description_text: Julie and Ivy work together to track down a secret military super-collider.

strangersinparadisev9_childofrage.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V9: Child of Rage
strangersinparadisev9_childofrage.description_text: Katchoo and Tambi attempt to bring down the Big Six cartel while Veronica lays a trap using Francine as bait.

strangersinparadisev16_mollyandpoo.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V16: Molly & Poo
strangersinparadisev16_mollyandpoo.description_text: Molly finds it difficult to separate fiction from reality as she writes a wicked new version of Jack The Ripper.

strangersinparadisev13_flowertoflame.human_name: Strangers in Paradise V13: Flower To Flame
strangersinparadisev13_flowertoflame.description_text: Katchoo fights to save her relationship with Francine while Tambi saves them all from a lethal plot of revenge.

basic_data.human_name: Humble Software Bundle: Make Your Own Games In Unreal Engine 5 from GameDev.tv
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Are you curious about turning your passion for gaming into a career in game development? Our latest bundle with GameDev.tv will help teach you how to use Unreal Engine 5 and get you started on an exciting new adventure. Master the universally beloved game engine with our comprehensive bundle composed of industry-leading courses like Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints: First Person Shooter, and more! Start creating and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.
basic_data.description:
From gamer to game developer. Are you curious about turning your passion for gaming into a career in game development? Our latest bundle with GameDev.tv will help teach you how to use Unreal Engine 5 and get you started on an exciting new adventure. Master the universally beloved game engine with our comprehensive bundle composed of industry-leading courses like Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints: First Person Shooter, and more! Start creating and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $2,130. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Keys for this bundle are redeemable on the GameDev.TV website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Direct Relief. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

GameDev.tv have spent the last decade working with world class instructors to create the perfect learning experience for game development. Join our global community of over 2 million students and start making your own games today!

unreal50cplusplusdevelopercourse.description_text:
Ready to make games in the amazing world of Unreal Engine 5?

This ""critically-acclaimed"" and ""insanely successful"" Unreal Engine course was created in collaboration with Epic Games.

We start super simple so no prior experience of Unreal or coding is needed! We believe project-based learning is the best way to learn Unreal Engine, so you’ll create 5 Unreal games (including a tank game and FPS)!

You’ll learn C++, the powerful industry-standard language from scratch. And by the end of the course, you'll be confident in the basics of coding and game development (and hungry to learn more - which is handy because there’s a ton more in this bundle!).

""Any serious game programmer needs to know C++"" Jason Gregory, Lead Programmer at Naughty Dog (creators of Uncharted & The Last of Us)

Benefit from our world-class support from both other students, and the instructors who are on the forums regularly.

Grab the bundle and start making UE5 games now!

unrealenginecinematiccreatorcourse.description_text:
Make your own cinematic moments (cut-scenes and gameplay moments) using Unreal Engine 4's Sequencer Tool.

Sequencer (which is included with the Unreal Editor - no additional download necessary) is a powerful editor which allows you to add tracks and animate everything from your cameras to your characters to your world.

In this course you’ll learn how to:

+ Create your own non-interactive cut-scene which is triggered from gameplay. + Compose interesting camera shots and animate your cameras as if you were Steven Spielberg's personal camera operator. + Create movement and flavor in your levels by animating world events to take place as the player moves through your level (explosions and landslides anyone?). + Create simple gameplay systems such as allowing the player to open doors when they run near them. + Create animation sequences and render them to movie format so that you can make your own short films!

fpsmusicassetpack.description_text:
Listen to the sounds of FPS action with 15 tracks of epic rhythm. Whether you're taking an arrow to the knee, or trying to save humanity from an alien invasion, this pack has everything you need musically to create an FPS or action game set in a far away land.

Includes both MP3 files and high quality WAV files!

This pack was designed by composer Jorge Velasco, and includes a wide range of compositions for varying emotions and landscapes!

unrealengine5_buildacompletesurvivalgame.human_name: Unreal Engine 5: Build a Complete Survival Game with Blueprint Course
unrealengine5_buildacompletesurvivalgame.description_text:
Ever dreamt of crafting your own survival game?

With this Unreal Engine 5 course, you’ll build a full-fledged survival adventure from scratch—tropical island, grid inventory, and enemy AI included!

Learn to master modular systems for crafting, building, and looting, all while optimising Blueprints for smooth gameplay.

Chop trees, battle foes, and design a stunning island paradise, step by step.

Whether you’re stuck on mechanics or new to modular coding, we’ve got you covered.

No half-finished projects here—just a polished survival game you’ll be proud of. Ready to conquer the wild? Nab this bundle and let’s dive in!

unrealengine2d_makeyourownepic2dgamesusi.human_name: Unreal Engine 2D: Make Your Own Epic 2D Games Using C++ Course
unrealengine2d_makeyourownepic2dgamesusi.description_text:
Start your 2D game dev journey with Unreal Engine and C++ in style!

This course takes you from sprites to full-on gameplay, teaching you how to craft platformers, shooters, and racers like a pro.

Get hands-on with Unreal’s 2D tools, including Paper2D and PaperZD, while building three rad games—Desert Racer, Gun Survivors, and Crusty Pirate.

Learn to design levels, code smooth gameplay, and create engaging mechanics with obstacles, enemies, and loot.

Whether you’re new to Unreal or switching from another engine, this is your guide to building 2D games that shine. Let’s make something awesome!

unrealengine5environmentdesigncourse.description_text:
Want to get up and running quickly in Unreal Engine 5? Fancy checking out how to make best use of the new technologies, Nanite and Lumen?

Perhaps you want to easily make your game level look AAA quality, or you’re wondering how to design aesthetically pleasing environments?

Then you’re in the right place!

You’ll learn how to use Unreal Engine 5 to make AAA looking natural environments. Using its new features, Nanite and Lumen, you’ll make beautiful looking levels. We’ll show you how to import free assets from Quixel Megascan and hand place them in your environment, adjusting the look of individual assets so they blend with other assets in your level.

You’ll create an interesting level layout which guides the player through your level. We’ll show you how to use the landscape and foliage tools to quickly bring your level to life and how to adjust lighting and post-processing, to get the best looking level possible.

So if you’re interested in making great looking levels in Unreal Engine or you fancy diving into Unreal 5’s new feature. This is the course for you.

unreal5_masterenhancedinputwithcplusplus.human_name: Unreal 5: Master Enhanced Input with C++ & Blueprints Course
unreal5_masterenhancedinputwithcplusplus.description_text:
Ready to unlock your game dev superpowers? Our Unreal Enhanced Input course is here to help you ditch the old system and master the shiny new one. You’ll set up custom input mappings, bind actions like a legend (C++ or Blueprint—your call), and finally understand those “what even are these” topics like value types, trigger states, and input modifiers.

By the end, you’ll be designing characters that move, rotate, and interact with controls smoother than your favourite speedrun.

No fluff, no jargon, just clear, practical lessons that make learning fun.

Grab the bundle now and let’s level up!

cplusplusfundamentalscourse.description_text:
Learning to program can be dull, and learning C++ is hard enough without having to learn a game engine as well.

In this course you’ll learn coding the fun way, by making games!

You'll start by compiling your first program in C++, using Visual Studio Code as your text editor. Then create your first axe dodging game using the Raylib library. This project introduces the basic concepts of programming: variables, loops and if-statements.

You expand on this in Dapper Dasher, by building a side-scrolling running game. In addition to covering essential programming concepts such as structs and functions, you'll learn to animate 2D characters and make your game pretty.

In Classy Clash we introduce Object Oriented Programming. You'll learn how this simplifies programming for games and how inheritance can avoid code duplication.

Whether you're a total beginner to programming and want to learn pure C++, or an intermediate Unreal student who wants to explore making games in pure C++, this is the course for you!

unrealengine5cplusplus_makeyourownaction.human_name: Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game Course
unrealengine5cplusplus_makeyourownaction.description_text:
Ready to craft third-person melee combat that feels straight out of a AAA brawler?

This Unreal Engine 5 course takes your C++ skills to the next level with action-packed systems, dynamic animations, and fierce enemy AI.

Lock onto targets with ease, cycle through slick attack combos, and build scalable stat systems that grow with your game.

You’ll write over a thousand lines of clean, efficient code, mastering interfaces, design patterns, and debugging like a pro.

By the end, you’ll have a polished combat game and the skills to tackle any Unreal project. Let’s make something epic (pun intended) —get the bundle and jump in now!

unrealengine5blueprintsfirstpersonshoote.human_name: Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints First Person Shooter (FPS) Course
unrealengine5blueprintsfirstpersonshoote.description_text:
Ready to create a game in the amazing world of Unreal Engine 5?

Make an awesome first person shooter game, where players will be spawned into a level with a handful of dangerous drones and tasked with destroying them to clear the zone!

Your game will have it all! You’ll create a first person shooter character, with movement mechanics and animation. Attach weapons and combat with effects including sounds and particle systems.

Then you get to create hostile enemy drones with pathfinding. Finally adding Game Mode and HUD with countdown timers, health bars, announcements, game states and score. Oh and it wouldn’t be a FPS game without health and ammo pickups, so you’ll learn that too!

This course is ideal if you want to make your own video games in UE5, are a beginner with no game development experience or if you have experience in other engines such as Unity.

So pick up the bundle and dive into the amazing world of UE5 now!

unrealengineblueprintgamedevelopercourse.human_name: Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer Course
unrealengineblueprintgamedevelopercourse.description_text:
Learn how to code your first video game in under 2 hours, with Visual Scripting. Created in collaboration with Epic Games.

This is the partner course to the Complete Unreal C++ Developer, one of the most popular Unreal courses on the web.

You’ll learn how to make games without writing traditional code by using Unreal Engine 4 and its powerful visual coding system, Blueprints. We’ll start at a beginners pace, so no prior experience or knowledge of Unreal Engine 4 or game development is needed.

By the end of just the first section, you’ll have gone from not even having Unreal installed to making your first game: Marble Run! In fact, once you become more confident you’ll be able to make the Marble Run game in less than 15 minutes! That's how easy and powerful Unreal Blueprint can be.

So what are you waiting for?

directrelief.description_text:
Donations to support Direct Relief are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Founded in 1948, Direct Relief is a nonprofit, nonpartisan organization that has become one the world’s largest providers of medical relief in the world. Direct Relief works with healthcare professionals and organizations on the ground, establishing partnerships with local organizations that provide health services to people who would otherwise not receive them. Active in all 50 states and in 70 countries, Direct Relief is the only U.S. nonprofit organization licensed and accredited to distribute prescription medications in all 50 U.S. states.  Among its distinctions, Direct Relief has top charity ratings, including four-star and "top-notch" ratings from Charity Navigator, a 100% fundraising efficiency rating from Forbes magazine, and was recently recognized by Fast Company as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Nonprofits in the World.

Direct Relief’s ongoing partnerships allow it to respond fast and expansively in times of emergency, including the devastating earthquakes in Nepal, where it has provided over $28 million (wholesale value) in medical aid to date.  This includes supplies for surgeries and treatment of trauma-related injuries, antibiotics, nutritional items, and other critical medical resources.

unrealengine5cplusplusmultiplayer_makeyo.human_name: Unreal Engine 5 C++ Multiplayer: Make Your Own Co-Op Game
unrealengine5cplusplusmultiplayer_makeyo.description_text:
Want to learn how to make your own online multiplayer adventure games?

Create a two player co-op action adventure game, while learning the code and principles needed to make whatever type of online multiplayer game you want to make!

Along with learning all about level design, you’ll also create different gameplay features like pressure plates, movable platforms and doors, and collectible keys.

By the end of the course you’ll have a fun co-op adventure game you can play with your friend online. Plus the tools to continue to work on it and really make it your own!

This is an intermediate course, so if you already know a bit of Unreal that’s ideal and if not, simply take one of the other Unreal courses in this bundle first - the Unreal 5 C++ Developer is a great starting point!

unrealmaterialpack1.description_text:
Make your game POP with this Materials Pack for Unreal! Stone, metal, gravel, rust, wood and so many more textures! This pack includes dozens of materials directly usable in Unreal Engine 5.1 to make your games look AMAZING! And with the included .Unreal scene file, you can get right into the action.

This material asset pack pack features:

24 master materials with some variations 50 material instances A preview map 1 Unreal Engine file with all the materials in them And you'll get the most out of it because:

This pack is built for use in your own projects You can use these materials to make your games look better All materials are fully configurable in Unreal Engine 5.1 All materials work for any mesh All materials are specially designed to be loopable and tileable This pack is perfect for any type of Unreal Engine game!

unrealengine5_actionadventuregamedevelop.human_name: Unreal Engine 5: Action Adventure Game Development Course
unrealengine5_actionadventuregamedevelop.description_text:
Want to make that 3rd person action adventure game you’ve always dreamt of?

All using the latest tools in Unreal 5.1, including MetaHumans, Quixel Bridge, Nanite and Lumen?

Your game will have it all! We'll teach you how to use raycasting to shoot weapons and deal damage to enemies, how to trigger events, move objects, create hazards and other important action adventure mechanics.

By the end of the course you’ll have your own playable level, complete with hazards, obstacles, pickups and interactables.

This course is ideal if you want to make a cool looking game or simply get better with Unreal and Blueprints.

directrelief.description_text:
Donations to support Direct Relief are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Founded in 1948, Direct Relief is a nonprofit, nonpartisan organization that has become one the world’s largest providers of medical relief in the world. Direct Relief works with healthcare professionals and organizations on the ground, establishing partnerships with local organizations that provide health services to people who would otherwise not receive them. from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Unreal 5.0 C++ Developer Course, Unreal Engine Cinematic Creator Course, Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer Course, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints First Person Shooter (FPS) Course, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Are you curious about turning your passion for gaming into a career in game development? Our latest bundle with GameDev.tv will help teach you how to use Unreal Engine 5 and get you started on an exciting new adventure. Master the universally beloved game engine with our comprehensive bundle composed of industry-leading courses like Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints: First Person Shooter, and more! Start creating and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.
from_bundle.author: GameDev.TV

basic_data.human_name: Humble RPG Bundle: 5th Edition Adventures, Crafting, Monsters and VTT Assets
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Gather up your party for new takes on classic adventures within the Dungeons & Dragons universe—this action-packed bundle supports one of the most iconic games ever! Our 5th Edition-centric TTRPG explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources like Endless Encounters: Dungeons, Ultimate Bestiary - The Dreaded Accursed, Deck of Dirty Tricks Vol 1., and more! Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey alongside your closest allies and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Elevate your next D&D adventure. Gather up your party for new takes on classic adventures within the Dungeons & Dragons universe—this action-packed bundle supports one of the most iconic games ever! Our 5th Edition-centric TTRPG explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources like Endless Encounters: Dungeons, Ultimate Bestiary - The Dreaded Accursed, Deck of Dirty Tricks Vol 1., and more! Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey alongside your closest allies and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $741. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF and zip formats, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Comic Book Legal Defense Fund. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

recordsofthefaithful_journeysoffaithaspl.human_name: Records of the Faithful: Journeys of Faith (A Splinters of Faith Map Folio)
recordsofthefaithful_journeysoffaithaspl.description_text: Compatible with Frog God Games Splinters of Faith, a continent-spanning quest beginning with a fowl and culminating in a fight against formidable wickedness, the maps provide various topographical settings for the campaign or can be customized for use in your own world, such as pastoral hamlets, subterranean mines, and monumental sanctuaries. This book boasts vivid, landscape-oriented maps from Splinters of Faith, crafted by the author to provide a reliable, aesthetically pleasing reference during gameplay.

objectsofintrigue.description_text: Objects of Intrigue can be used to generate random quest starters, monster encounters, and exciting trinkets in a variety of environments. Outcome has four possible outcomes for added versatility. This PDF contains five uniquely themed sections, sorted by environment including: Dungeon Underground Urban Waterways Wilderlands

recordsoffaith_playersjournalasplinterso.human_name: Records of Faith: Player's Journal (A Splinters of Faith 2022 Supplement)
recordsoffaith_playersjournalasplinterso.description_text: Compatible with Frog God Games' Splinters of Faith, a continent-spanning quest beginning with a fowl and culminating in a fight against formidable wickedness, the maps provide various topographical settings for the campaign or can be customized for use in your own world, such as pastoral hamlets, subterranean mines, and monumental sanctuaries.

comicbooklegaldefensefund.description_text:
Donations to support Comic Book Legal Defense Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Comic Book Legal Defense Fund is a non-profit organization protecting the freedom to read comics! Our work protects readers, creators, librarians, retailers, publishers, & educators who face the threat of censorship. We monitor legislation & challenge laws that would limit the First Amendment. We create resources that promote understanding of comics & the rights our community is guaranteed. Every day we publish news & information about censorship events as they happen. We are partners in the Kids' Right to Read Project & Banned Books Week. Our expert legal team is available at a moment's notice to respond to First Amendment emergencies. CBLDF is a lean organization that works hard to protect the rights that our community depends on. Please support our important work!

losttriptych.description_text: Minions of a rival deity have stolen a sacred artifact of your order with the intent to transform it to suit their own nefarious machinations. They have brought the holy device to the Mountain of Whispers, the stomping grounds of evil sycophants and zealot soldiers who serve the goddess Egramish without question. Your precious artifact has been broken into separate pieces and hidden in secret locations to make it harder for your order to recover. No doubt, the high priest Miltotok is preparing the rituals and spells to make the device a vessel for evil at this very moment. Is your faith strong enough to endure the evil horrors of the mountain, where your gods can barely be felt? Can you persevere through overwhelming odds to defeat Egramish and recover the Lost Triptych? The Lost Triptych is a campaign for characters level 8-12 for the 5th Edition game system!

splintersoffaithcryhavocanddogsoforcus5e.description_text: Let Slip the Dogs of War! Need villains for your campaign? Look no further than Cry Havoc!, a sourcebook detailing the Dogs of Orcus! These dastardly evildoers occupy every level of society, with the shared goal of doing the Prince of the Undead's bidding. This color-printed softcover booklet details different members of this nefarious faction (with stats for 5e and OSR systems) for you to introduce into your game.

decksofdirtytricks_vol1.description_text: Made for use during game sessions to encourage unexpected events and player interactivity. With suggestions for changes in the narration and their potential mechanical implications. It is system neutral but works best with any one of the many variations of the world’s most popular roleplaying game.

awaterydeath.description_text: This pack contains sea and water creatures of all types, perfect for adventure on the high seas and great rivers! The pack contains 25 bordered, full-body tokens for monsters published by Frog God Games.

terribletrouble.description_text: This set of 25 tokens Includes a variety of gargoyles, golems, variant bulettes, and trolls (plus a couple of genies to round out the set). The pack contains 25 bordered, full-body tokens for monsters published by Frog God Games.

dragonselementalsfeyandgiants.description_text: An assortment of basic but powerful creatures that appear in many adventures.

splintersoffaith2022vttassetpack.human_name: Splinters of Faith 2022 VTT Asset Pack
splintersoffaith2022vttassetpack.description_text: These are the maps and tokens for the adventure, Splinters of Faith, but they can be used for any adventure.

city3.description_text: Every nautical adventure starts somewhere. GMs can add this port city to the campaign as a beginning haven for PCs, a stop along the way for their sea quests, or the new home of privateers who seek riches on the ocean blue.

city2.description_text: This virtual map comes from the adventure "The City that Dripped Blood" but can easily be incorporated into whatever game you have the desire to use them for. GMs can never have too many city maps at their disposal!

allcreaturesgreatandsmall.description_text: This pack contains animals of all types, excellent for wilderness adventures! The pack contains 25 bordered, full-body tokens for monsters published by Frog God Games.

city1.description_text: Port Shaw presents players with a waterside city ready to be explored and lived in. Whether a home base, a stay on the road, a port for seafaring pathways, or somewhere to ferret out some hidden person or item, this map will provide plenty of urban play while lending itself to adventures by land or by sea.

dinosaursandmore.description_text: When it’s time to get prehistoric, these tokens have got you covered!

powersoftheplanes.description_text: A set of the extremely powerful creatures and beings who rule planes of existence beyond material reality!

abberationsandcelestials.description_text: This Token Pack includes all things from weird to wonderful!

shipsdocksandothermovingstructures2.human_name: Ships, Docks, and Other Moving Structures 2
shipsdocksandothermovingstructures2.description_text: Need a chaotic scene like a port town on fire with ships ablaze as it comes under attack? Here's your map. Hailing from "Razor Coast," this stunning map will be of use to inventive GMs who require a town fighting fires (and maybe invaders) to host their gameplay.

shipsdocksandothermovingstructures1.human_name: Ships, Docks, and Other Moving Structures 1
shipsdocksandothermovingstructures1.description_text: This ring of ships belongs to the "Isle of the Angry Apes," but creative game masters can place this map in any lake, river, or sea adventure. The building and tent on the shore, along with the nearby trail, are yours to flesh out.

bookofbeginnings.description_text: The Book of Beginnings offers you and your table a multitude of thrilling adventures used to kick off your 5th edition campaign. All are designed to cover the three main pillars of play: combat, exploration, and roleplay. However, some adventures are more heavily geared to certain pillars. This offers groups with specific interests the most amount of familiarity as possible. There are beginnings for 1st, 3rd, and 5th level; however, any can be easily adapted to different levels of play by altering monsters, DCs, and severity of environmental hazards (traps, noxious gases, evil GMs, etc). Even if you have already begun your latest and greatest campaign, these adventures can easily be adapted to be side quests. Despite level of play, you should know your next best adventure is around the corner! Book of Beginnings is designed for a variety of character levels for the 5th edition game system.

ultimatebestiary_revengeofthehorde.human_name: Ultimate Bestiary - Revenge of the Horde
ultimatebestiary_revengeofthehorde.description_text: UNLEASH THE HORDE! Ultimate Bestiary: Revenge of the Horde is not another A-Z of monsters. Instead, we have focused on some of the commonly encountered monstrous races like goblins, gnolls, and orcs. Detailing their cultures, environments, and attitudes; as well as introducing a wide variety of stat blocks to suit a range of challenge levels, each with their own unique artwork.

wingsandweather.description_text: This set of tokens contains dragons and elementals for those times when you absolutely, positively, need to set things on fire (or bury them, blow them away, or drown them)!

whisperandvenom5e.description_text: Whisper & Venom is a setting and adventure located in the Whisper Vale, an isolated community of insular villagers beset by an outside supernatural force and hardships of their own making. Whisper & Venom is an epic adventure designed to be deadly for parties of 4–8 Old-School Essentials characters of levels 3–5 or 4–8 Fifth Edition (5e) Tier One characters (henchmen available, but not included) and useful to players, gamemasters, and referees.

ultimatebestiary_thedreadedaccursed.description_text: Ultimate Bestiary: The Dreaded Accursed presents a variety of the classic undead and cursed creatures, including ghosts, ghouls, liches, lycanthropes and vampires, fleshing out their origins, habits and habitats, and introducing a wealth of stat blocks to challenge your players from level one to the end of their adventuring careers.

intotheunknown.description_text: Welcome to a world of new adventure! The day has finally come. Your training at Farrador Keep has come to its end. You are now a fully-fledged adventurer ready to make your name known in all the lands. However, this time, you will go it alone. Farrador is a relatively peaceful region; however, menacing monsters reside in the shadows of even the brightest lights. You are being called to explore abandoned mines, save villages from devastating foes, and claim your name as the next true adventurer. All this and more will be possible as you go Into the Unknown! Into the Unknown is a true solo adventure for characters level 1-5 for the 5th Edition game system.

splintersoffaith20225e.description_text: Splinters of Faith is a series of 11 linked adventures centered on stopping the return of the dread death-priest Akruel Rathamon and his undead minions. The campaign takes characters across hundreds of miles as they race to different temples to restore the broken Scepter of Faiths, a powerful weapon that once stopped the warlord. It all starts when some chickens go missing. But this fowl beginning might mean a foul ending for your characters. The Splinters of Faith Campaign is a series of linked adventures that starts with a few chickens going missing and eventually leads to a deadly confrontation with a reawakened death-priest. Along the way, characters must recreate a relic called the scepter of faiths to aid them when they finally face off against the death-priest. This campaign is designed to take characters from 1st level all the way to 14th level or higher.

newold-schoolpreview.description_text: A preview of upcoming products, including The Necromancer's Game and Arden's Adventures 'zine

deckofdirtytricks_vol3.description_text: Made for use during game sessions to encourage unexpected events and player interactivity. With suggestions for changes in the narration and their potential mechanical implications. It is system neutral but works best with any one of the many variations of the world’s most popular roleplaying game.

ultimateguidetoalchemycraftingandenchant.human_name: The Ultimate Guide to Alchemy, Crafting, and Enchanting
ultimateguidetoalchemycraftingandenchant.description_text: Crafting & Enchanting is a comprehensive companion for not only magic items, but organically integrating item creation into your 5E games. Rise through the ranks of the associations that oversee the varied studies of alchemy, crafting, and enchanting. Each rank comes with new recipes and benefits, but be careful, because if you don’t adhere to the association’s principles, you could fall into bad standing, or worse. Don't worry - for the rule-breakers and rebels, there’s always the black market... Finally, this book contains tables for the harvesting and foraging of ingredients, hundreds of recipes for both new and existing items, and 200 brand new, ready-to-use magic items. With this guide’s help, you can become a master crafter, and forge some of the most powerful artifacts the realms have ever seen.

ultimateguidetoforagingharvestingandnatu.human_name: The Ultimate Guide to Foraging, Harvesting & Natural Discovery
ultimateguidetoforagingharvestingandnatu.description_text: The Ultimate Guide to Foraging, Harvesting & Natural Discovery is the follow-up to our ever-popular Ultimate Guide to Alchemy, Crafting & Enchanting. In that book, we provided a framework for player characters to create their own magical and non magical items in their 5th Edition D&D campaigns. This book expands on the Foraging and Harvesting appendices from Alchemy, Crafting & Enchanting, as well as offering new player options for downtime activities that allow them to upgrade items, advance in their guild, and enrich their character with new experiences outside of adventuring. It also continues the Magic Item Compendium, originally found in Alchemy, Crafting & Enchanting, with its own chapter featuring 200 new magic items.

islands2.description_text: Political, naval, and mercantile intrigue are all possibilities while using this map (originally from "The Blight") in your campaign. A nice regional map ready to be assimilated in an ocean of your campaign.

islands3.description_text: Volcanic eruptions in the middle of the sea birthed this island. Maybe lava children now call it home. Add to that some NPC machinations and referee plot devices, and this island can be a memorable location for adventure and danger.

islands1.description_text: Island adventures can be set on this map with several encounter areas ready for a savvy Game Master to populate.

pathofthevanished.description_text: It has been 50 years since the purple-sailed ships terrorized the coasts; however, they have returned, and this time they have become more ruthless and horrifically efficient. Entire villages disappear in a single night; no survivor nor corpse has been recovered. Darker still is the purpose that drives these new Raiders as those that they captured do not appear in any of the black markets, near or far. A brave group of adventurers managed to defeat the Raiders in the past, and such a group must be summoned to follow the Path of the Vanished! Path of the Vanished is designed for characters levels 1-10 for the 5th Edition game system.

undeadhorrors.description_text: No game is complete without an assortment of undead, and it’s even better when the players have no idea what they’re facing! The pack contains 25 bordered, full-body tokens for monsters published by Frog God Games.

tomeofhorrors2020cardsdeckone.human_name: Tome of Horrors 2020 Cards Deck ONE
tomeofhorrors2020cardsdeckone.description_text: Game Masters, lighten your workload with Tome of Horrors Monster Cards. These cards can help you quickly set up your games. Shuffle them with cards from all three decks, and deal them for random encounters. Use them when preparing a game, or retrieve monsters' details easily during a game.

elementsofinspiration.description_text: Set off for adventure with Elements of Inspiration - our most expansive, detailed, and dynamic tool for fantasy roleplaying games and storytelling yet. This PDF contains exploration, roleplay, and combat encounter cues, each for a different environment, for fantasy roleplaying games, writers, and storytellers. No matter where your heroes roam, exciting events are ready for them to experience, with each deck based on an environment found in fantasy adventures, including: Deserts, Forests, Mountains, Plains, Swamps, Tundra, Underground, Urban, and Waterways

seakingsmalicevttpack.human_name: Sea King's Malice: VTT Asset Pack
seakingsmalicevttpack.description_text:
Ahoy, landlubbers! If you are looking for some aquatic tokens to spice up your VTT game, you've come to the right port. This token pack was designed to work with the Sea King's Malice adventure but feel free to use them in any water-based adventure you want.

This is a map pack set for Sea King’s Malice and for the ships of Sea King’s Malice. They contain both the Player Maps and GM Maps.

whisperandvenomvttassetpack.description_text: These are the maps and tokens for the adventure, Whisper & Venom, but they can be used for any mountainous or tundra-themed adventure.

tomeofquests5e.description_text:
The Tome of Quests: Volume One is an adventure compendium for the 5th Edition game system! This tome will take you through five adventures that can be run separately or linked together with a seamless and compelling narrative. Each adventure features full color art and maps as well as new magic items and monsters to challenge, and reward, your players!

The Tome of Quests has been in the works at Pacesetter Games for over 10 years! Each adventure featured in Volume One comes from the very first year as a publishing company. Now years later, we have updated the adventures and given them the posh upgrades they deserve! Now is a better time than ever to start adding Pacesetter legacy works to your library!

coastandshorefront1.description_text: The mouth of this river empties to the sea of your choosing. The river's arteries, isles, and lagoons can hide treasures, monsters, perils, and death for the curious and adventurous.

coastandshorefront2.description_text: Baal, that ominous being of old, has this sea named for him. Thanks to the dangers and perils that prevent the civilized world from probing its lands and uncovering its riches, only the hardiest of sailors and thrill-seekers dare navigate these waters.

coastandshorefront3.description_text: This map features a beaver dam, a beaver lodge, and the nearby coastline. Of course, GMs are encouraged to fill in the beaver-made pond with other hazards and denizens for their enjoyment.

fiendsanddemons.description_text: A set of fiends and demons for those who dabble in things they really shouldn’t dabble in.

ultimatenpcs_skulduggery.description_text: Step into the tavern. The rooms are warm (ish), and the rates are low (almost suspiciously so), just don't ask what's in the pies and don't expect to have all your valuables come morning. A tool for Games Masters and Players alike, Ultimate NPCs: Skulduggery features: A full-world character collection Game backstories Character quick-reference stats NPC or player character options Occupying the seedy tap-houses and criminal underbelly of civilization, you'll find a variety of thieves, assassins and mercenaries within, each with the backstory and statistics necessary to run as an NPC or player character in your favorite tabletop RPG game. So pull up a stool, try the ale (don't mind the lumps), and meet the regulars… Product Specs: 30 finely crafted NPCs (levels 1, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20) 180 unique characters Compatible with 5th Edition.

ultimatenpcs_warfare.description_text: In this tome you will find 30 finely crafted NPCs stated out at levels 1, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. This produces 180 unique characters with backstories, personality traits, role playing cues, unique items, and more! Compatible with 5th Edition. Make sure to get your copy today!

deckofdirtytricks_vol2.description_text: Made for use during game sessions to encourage unexpected events and player interactivity. With suggestions for changes in the narration and their potential mechanical implications. It is system neutral but works best with any one of the many variations of the world’s most popular roleplaying game.

giantsandotherproblem.description_text: Giants aren’t the only problem adventurers face with this tokens pack, but they’re a pretty big problem! The pack contains 25 bordered, full-body tokens for monsters published by Frog God Games.

demons_froggod.description_text: Get your holy water ready, because this set of 25 demon tokens puts the forces of the underworld at your disposal. The pack contains 25 bordered, full-body tokens for monsters published by Frog God Games.

seakingsmalice5e.description_text: In the murky depths sits a brooding menace, ancient, indescribably evil, and ravenously hungry. Perched on his massive throne, the Sea King dreams of his massive jaws bathing in runnels of fresh land-dweller blood. He dreams of the ecstasy of rending air-breather flesh. His hate-filled dreams suffuse him with visions of presiding over a glorious and bloody feast where his despised enemies — those both above and below the waves — drown in a tide of their own blood, torn apart by his fierce warriors. In this sprawling adventure, the characters will come face to face with this terrible menace. Only the most stalwart and bravest of heroes will have any chance of surviving the hazards of the open sea and the perils of other strange and yet unknown lands, both above and below the waves, as they search for clues surrounding the disappearance of the missing ship. For in the sea-green depths a brooding menace awaits them, filled with inhuman hatred of all things of the surface world. The adventurers’ journey will end — one way or the other — in the Court of the terrifying Sea King. This edge-of-your-seat 5e adventure takes characters to level 10.

endlessencounters.description_text: Within these pages are dozens of charts for each level (1-10) that generate memorable encounters with just a few dice rolls. Whether you need to add an encounter to your adventure or design an entire dungeon, EE: Dungeons is an exhaustive resource and easy to use. Charts include everything you need to create an amazing encounter including illumination, room type, room contents, traps, monsters (full statistic blocks), treasures, and much more. EE: Dungeons also has 53 new monsters and 64 new magical items! Of course there is more in the form of a complete sample dungeon for each level with room descriptions and full-color map. All ten levels connect and form a mega-dungeon with more than 500 encounters! EE: Dungeons is designed for use with the 5e RPG and compatible with all other OSR classic game systems based on the world’s largest fantasy RPG. Endless Encounters: Dungeons is an encounter and adventure generator for characters level 1-10 using the 5th edition game system!

tomeofhorrors2020cardsdecktwo.human_name: Tome of Horrors 2020 Cards Deck TWO
tomeofhorrors2020cardsdecktwo.description_text: Game Masters, lighten your workload with Tome of Horrors Monster Cards. These cards can help you quickly set up your games. Shuffle them with cards from all three decks, and deal them for random encounters. Use them when preparing a game, or retrieve monsters' details easily during a game.

treacheroustraps.description_text: Treacherous Traps is an incredible resource for game masters looking to get more out of their dungeon design. Contained within are over 250 pre-built traps ranging in level and lethality, so that you can always find the perfect trap to challenge your players. Also included is a random trap generator, consisting of 50 trap triggers and 50 trap effects that, when combined, create up to 2,500 different combinations. Along with the tips and tricks for using traps, puzzles, and riddles in your fantasy games, Treacherous Traps is the perfect accessory for any dungeon architect!

recordsoffaith_gmsjournalasplintersoffai.human_name: Records of Faith: GM's Journal (A Splinters of Faith 2022 Supplement)
recordsoffaith_gmsjournalasplintersoffai.description_text: Compatible with Frog God Games Splinters of Faith, a continent-spanning quest beginning with a fowl and culminating in a fight against formidable wickedness, the maps provide various topographical settings for the campaign or can be customized for use in your own world, such as pastoral hamlets, subterranean mines, and monumental sanctuaries.

seakingsmaliceartbook.description_text: Useful for illustrating scenes and areas from the book without showing your players the book itself, in full color.

tomeofhorrors2020cardsdeckthree.human_name: Tome of Horrors 2020 Cards Deck THREE
tomeofhorrors2020cardsdeckthree.description_text: Game Masters, lighten your workload with Tome of Horrors Monster Cards. These cards can help you quickly set up your games. Shuffle them with cards from all three decks, and deal them for random encounters. Use them when preparing a game, or retrieve monsters' details easily during a game.

exwynshandbooktoheroism.description_text:
The wonderful world of Dagmoor is gleaming with magic and unexplored knowledge. One brave mage set out to explore these lesser known corners of the world in search of techniques of the body, mind, and soul to enhance any adventurer's journey. Lucky for us, Exwyn has decided to compile his notes and publish them in his very own field guide, Exwyn's Handbook to Heroism! Exwyn's Handbook to Heroism features new character options such as subclasses, races/subraces, spells, and feats to level up your 5e games! The following new content is currently included in this book:

38 subclasses

10 races/subraces

31 spells

10 feats

shipsdocksandothermovingstructures3.human_name: Ships, Docks, and Other Moving Structures 3
shipsdocksandothermovingstructures3.description_text: This map can represent an intact or ruined ship. Fresh from Rappan Athuk, this map could be rated, "Arrr, matey!" should pirates ransack the party and abscond with their ill-gotten gains.

Donations to support Comic Book Legal Defense Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Comic Book Legal Defense Fund is a non-profit organization protecting the freedom to read comics! Our work protects readers, creators, librarians, retailers, publishers, & educators who face the threat of censorship. We monitor legislation & challenge laws that would limit the First Amendment. We create resources that promote understanding of comics & the rights our community is guaranteed. Every day we publish news & information about censorship events as they happen. Our 5th Edition-centric TTRPG explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources like Endless Encounters: Dungeons, Ultimate Bestiary - The Dreaded Accursed, Deck of Dirty Tricks Vol 1., and more! Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey alongside your closest allies and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!

basic_data.human_name: Monster Hunter New Year Hunting Collection
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: If you’ve been waiting to get into the smash-hit Monster Hunter, this bundle is your golden opportunity. Get your hands on the two most recent Monster Hunter games, plus both of their critically acclaimed expansions. Monster Hunter World redefined the series when it launched in 2018, and its beloved expansion Iceborne introduced a host of awesome new beasts to hunt alongside plenty of game-changing systems. Monster Hunter Rise and the Sunbreak expansion doubled-down on World’s refinements, with an emphasis on exhilarating dog-riding and wirebug-zipping mobility. Pay what you want for the deluxe versions of both of these must-play games and their expansions, and help support Breakthrough T1D with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
The hunt is on in 2025. If you’ve been waiting to get into the smash-hit Monster Hunter, this bundle is your golden opportunity. Get your hands on the two most recent Monster Hunter games, plus both of their critically acclaimed expansions. Monster Hunter World redefined the series when it launched in 2018, and its beloved expansion Iceborne introduced a host of awesome new beasts to hunt alongside plenty of game-changing systems. Monster Hunter Rise and the Sunbreak expansion doubled-down on World’s refinements, with an emphasis on exhilarating dog-riding and wirebug-zipping mobility. Pay what you want for the deluxe versions of both of these must-play games and their expansions, and help support Breakthrough T1D with your purchase!

Pay $10 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $204. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $10 purchase. Pay $10 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows. Please check out the full system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Breakthrough T1D. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

monsterhunter_world_iceborne.description_text:
Monster Hunter World: Iceborne – a massive new expansion

“Explore the New World… and Beyond!“
Monster Hunter: World’s adventures reach new heights in “Monster Hunter World: Iceborne.”
With new monsters, new locales, new quests, new weapon combos, and so much more,
Iceborne expands the possibilities of Monster Hunter: World’s vast, breathtaking universe.

Join the Research Commission as they embark on an unforgettable adventure into the
depths of the Hoarfrost Reach, a snowy tundra that a host of legendary monsters call home.

Iceborne nearly DOUBLES the content from Monster Hunter: World
・New Monsters: The number of Large Monsters soars from 36 to over 66, with more coming in free updates!
・New Story: The number of Story Assignments jumps from 25 to over 50!
・New Locales: Explore the glacial landscapes of the Hoarfrost Reach!
・New Weapon Combos: Breathe new life into your combat with a series of brand-new attacks and combos
・New Armor: Suit up and customize your hunter with a wide variety of powerful armor skills!
・New Tools: Stack the odds in your favor with the revolutionary new Clutch Claw!
・New Headquarters: Group up and prepare for battle in the all-new social hub Seliana!
・New Difficulty: Test your mettle with the new quest difficulty Master Rank!
・New End Game: The journey never ends in the Guiding Lands!
…and much more!

The frozen frontier awaits…

monsterhunterrise_sunbreak.description_text:
Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak expansion
The world of Monster Hunter Rise gets bigger and deeper with this massive expansion featuring new monsters, new locales and more!

  • A new adventure in a distant land
    Renowned as the "Fierce Flame of Kamura” since the events of Monster Hunter Rise, you must set sail to uncover the cause of a terrible threat facing a kingdom across the sea!

  • New enemies arrive, old foes return
    Arriving in Elgado Outpost, you discover that the abnormal events threatening this kingdom are caused by Malzeno, Lunagaron and Garangolm – terrifying monsters known locally as the Three Lords. In addition to these new enemies, You must also face old foes as series monsters not featured in Monster Hunter Rise make their return!

  • Deeper gameplay
    Your trusty Wirebug returns and is more useful than ever, with the addition of new abilities for all 14 weapon types that bring a new level of flexibility and depth to the hunting action.

  • A colourful cast of characters
    Your new base of operations features a variety of locals to interact with, each with their own charming personality. Sometimes they will need your hunter’s help, and sometimes they will be the ones who help you out!
Note: You must own Monster Hunter Rise in order to play this expansion. Sunbreak content is accessible after completion of the 7-star Hub quest “Serpent Goddess of Thunder”.

monsterhunter_world.description_text:
Welcome to a new world! Take on the role of a hunter and slay ferocious monsters in a living, breathing ecosystem where you can use the landscape and its diverse inhabitants to get the upper hand. Hunt alone or in co-op with up to three other players, and use materials collected from fallen foes to craft new gear and take on even bigger, badder beasts!

INTRODUCTION
Overview
Battle gigantic monsters in epic locales.

As a hunter, you'll take on quests to hunt monsters in a variety of habitats.
Take down these monsters and receive materials that you can use to create stronger weapons and armor in order to hunt even more dangerous monsters.

In Monster Hunter: World, the latest installment in the series, you can enjoy the ultimate hunting experience, using everything at your disposal to hunt monsters in a new world teeming with surprises and excitement.

Setting
Once every decade, elder dragons trek across the sea to travel to the land known as the New World in a migration referred to as the Elder Crossing.

To get to the bottom of this mysterious phenomenon, the Guild has formed the Research Commission, dispatching them in large fleets to the New World.

As the Commission sends its Fifth Fleet in pursuit of the colossal elder dragon, Zorah Magdaros, one hunter is about to embark on a journey grander than anything they could have ever imagined.

ECOSYSTEM
A World That Breathes Life
There are various locations teeming with wildlife. Expeditions into these locales are bound to turn up interesting discoveries.

HUNTING
A Diverse Arsenal, and an Indispensable Partner
Your equipment will give you the power to need to carve out a place for yourself in the New World.

The Hunter's Arsenal
There are fourteen different weapons at the hunter's disposal, each with its own unique characteristics and attacks. Many hunters acquire proficiency in multiple types, while others prefer to attain mastery of one.

Scoutflies
Monster tracks, such as footprints and gashes, dot each locale. Your Scoutflies will remember the scent of a monster and guide you to other nearby tracks. And as you gather more tracks, the Scoutflies will give you even more information.

Slinger
The Slinger is an indispensable tool for a hunter, allowing you to arm yourself with stones and nuts that can be gathered from each locale.
From diversion tactics to creating shortcuts, the Slinger has a variety of uses, and allows you to hunt in new and interesting ways.

Specialized Tools
Specialized tools activate powerful effects for a limited amount of time, and up to two can be equipped at a time. Simple to use, they can be selected and activated just like any other item you take out on a hunt.

Palicoes
Palicoes are hunters' reliable comrades out in the field, specialized in a variety of offensive, defensive, and restorative support abilities.
The hunter's Palico joins the Fifth Fleet with pride, as much a bona fide member of the Commission as any other hunter.

coupon20offmonsterhunterstories.description_text:
Get 15% off Monster Hunter Stories in the Humble Store!

NOTE: Expires February 7th, 2025, 6pm PST. Does not stack with Humble Store sales.

Monster Hunter Stories is an RPG that takes the world of Monster Hunter and expands upon it in new and exciting ways! No longer are you hunting monsters, but raising them! In this deep story featuring heroes known as Monster Riders, you will live alongside monsters and form lifelong bonds with them.

The first installment of the Monster Hunter Stories series returns, fully voiced in Japanese and English, with additional features such as a new museum mode where you can listen to music and view concept art, allowing you to dive even deeper into the world of Monster Hunter Stories.

Story:
As the hero of the story, you were born in a village of Riders who raise monsters for a living. You’ll overcome trials and tribulations as you grow as a Rider, and leave your village to embark on an adventure. Your destination: the world of Hunters, who make their living by hunting monsters. Although their lifestyles are vastly different, you must learn to live and work together with Hunters, and in turn, bring the world of Hunters and Riders ever closer.

Things take a dark turn as a calamity known as the Black Blight appears, threatening the entire world and upending peaceful lives that were taken for granted... Both Riders and Hunters alike will be put to the test in order to challenge this threat.

The keys to saving the world are the Kinship Stone and its hidden power, along with the truth of the “Legend of Redan,” which describes the long-kept secret of the Riders’ origins! Along your epic journey, you will discover the true meaning of Kinship, which grows as your bonds deepen! A story of friendship and triumph await you—ride on into the world of Monster Hunter Stories!

Game Features:
■ A turn-based RPG set in the world of Monster Hunter!
Monster Hunter Stories features a strategic battle system which is easy to get the hang of, even for those who struggle with action games. Use Power, Speed, and Technical attacks to guess and overcome your opponent's attack patterns to inflict heavy damage and win head-to-head battles! Build up your Kinship Gauge to use skills or try your Monsties' unique Kinship Skills!

■ Turn popular monsters from the series into your Monsties!
Explore the field using Monstie abilities, hatch eggs that you find along the way, and turn various monsters into Monsties! This game features many popular monsters from the Monster Hunter series, including Zinogre, Nargacuga, and Lagiacrus.

The Rite of Channeling is a ritual that awakens dormant abilities in your Monsties, allowing you to raise original Monsties and take on powerful enemies!

■ Online Features
Create a powerful party with the Monsties you have raised and enjoy battles with other players!

New Features:
■ Fully voiced in Japanese and English!
The narrative is even more immersive with full Japanese and English voices!

■ Bonus Museum content
Enjoy more than 200 pieces of concept art, including some which have never been seen before, and numerous music tracks. Some tracks are being featured in surround sound for the first time!

■ All updates are included

Includes all the monsters added in updates to the original game, such as Kushala Daora, Teostra, and Rajang, as well as expanded endgame content and additional character editing parts, making this the complete package!

monsterhunter_world-deluxekit.description_text:
Adds the following contents to Monster Hunter: World:

  • Samurai Set
    Layered armor sets will change the look of your armor without changing the properties underneath. Equip this Samurai set over your favorite armor to take on the striking appearance of a feudal Japanese samurai warrior!
    Note : No weapons are included with this set

  • Gesture: Zen
  • Gesture: Ninja Star
  • Gesture: Sumo Slap
    Enjoy three new amusing gestures you can use when interacting with other players in the game.

  • Sticker Set: MH All-Stars Set
  • Sticker Set: Sir Loin Set
    Fun stickers you can use when chatting with other players in the game.

  • Face Paint: Wyvern
    Add a new face paint for character customisation in Monster Hunter: World.

  • Hairstyle: Topknot
    Adds a new hairstyle for character customisation in Monster Hunter: World.

monsterhunterworld_icebornedeluxekit.human_name: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne Deluxe Kit
monsterhunterworld_icebornedeluxekit.description_text:
Expand your ‘Monster Hunter World: Iceborne’ experience with this special ‘Deluxe Kit’ that adds a wide variety of content ranging from layered armor, gestures, sticker sets, additional character creation options and new decorations to personalize your hunter’s living space!

The ‘Deluxe Kit’ includes the following pieces:
- "Silver Knight" layered armor set
- "Flourish" gesture
- "Pledge" gesture
- "Genuflect" gesture
- "Research Commission Set 2" sticker set
- "Pearlspring Macaque Set" sticker set
- "Rising Dragon" face paint
- "Flowing" hairstyle
- "Traditional Decor Set" room decor set

Note: Layered armor only changes your character's appearance.

jdrf.description_text: As the leading global type 1 diabetes research and advocacy organization, we help make everyday life better while driving toward cures. We are opening doors that were once closed by T1D diagnosis. We lead the way to more effective solutions by connecting the brightest minds to advance treatments, influence policy, and improve access to care.​ By driving innovation forward, we will make T1D a thing of the past.

coupon25offmonsterhunterstories2_wingsof.human_name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin 25% OFF
coupon25offmonsterhunterstories2_wingsof.description_text:
Get 25% off Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin in the Humble Store!

NOTE: Expires February 7th, 2025, 6pm PST. Does not stack with Humble Store sales.

Monster Hunter's turn-based RPG series returns with its second installment! Will your special bond with these monsters bring hope or destruction?

A new adventure awaits you in this second installment of the turn-based RPG series set in the world of Monster Hunter! Become a Rider and form bonds with friendly monsters known as Monsties to fight alongside them as you take part in an epic story.

You play as the grandson of Red, a legendary Rider. The story begins with a fateful encounter with Ena, a Wyverian girl who has been entrusted with an egg with the potential to hatch into a legendary Rathalos which could wreak havoc if awakened to its destructive power.

Embark on a journey which will test the bonds of friendship in a changing world, and discover the truth behind the legends of old.A Nintendo Switch Online membership may be required for online play. Please check the game detail page on Nintendo.com for membership requirements.

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. 2021 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

MONSTER HUNTER STORIES is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. in the U.S. and/or other countries.

monsterhunterrisedeluxekit.description_text:
Hunt in style with a selection of fun cosmetic add-on items, which let you dress up your hunter and your Palico and Palamute buddies and show off to your fellow players! You can even express yourself using cool gestures and poses.

- "Kamurai" Hunter layered armor set
- "Shuriken Collar" Palamute layered armor piece
- "Fish Collar" Palico layered armor piece
- Gestures (4 Jumps)
- Samurai pose set
- Kabuki face paint
- "Izuchi Tail" hairstyle

monsterhunterrise.description_text:
Rise to the challenge and join the hunt! In Monster Hunter Rise, the latest installment in the award-winning and top-selling Monster Hunter series, you’ll become a hunter, explore brand new maps and use a variety of weapons to take down fearsome monsters as part of an all-new storyline. The PC release also comes packed with a number of additional visual and performance enhancing optimizations.

Ferocious monsters with unique ecologies
Hunt down a plethora of monsters with distinct behaviors and deadly ferocity. From classic returning monsters to all-new creatures inspired by Japanese folklore, including the flagship wyvern Magnamalo, you’ll need to think on your feet and master their unique tendencies if you hope to reap any of the rewards!


Choose your weapon and show your skills
Wield 14 different weapon types that offer unique gameplay styles, both up-close and from long range. Charge up and hit hard with the devastating Great Sword; dispatch monsters in style using the elegant Long Sword; become a deadly maelstrom of blades with the speedy Dual Blades; charge forth with the punishing Lance; or take aim from a distance with the Bow and Bowguns. These are just a few of the weapon types available in the game, meaning you’re sure to find the play style that suits you best.


Hunt, gather and craft your way to the top of the food chain
Each monster you hunt will provide materials that allow you to craft new weapons and armor and upgrade your existing gear. Go back out on the field and hunt even fiercer monsters and earn even better rewards! You can change your weapon at any of the Equipment Boxes any time, so the possibilities are limitless!


Hunt solo or team up to take monsters down
The Hunter Hub offers multiplayer quests where up to four players can team up to take on targets together. Difficulty scaling ensures that whether you go solo or hit the hunt as a full four-person squad, it’s always a fair fight.


Stunning visuals, unlocked framerate and other PC optimizations
Enjoy beautiful graphics at up 4K resolution, HDR with support for features including ultrawide monitors and an unlocked frame rate make to make this a truly immersive monster-hunting experience. Hunters will also get immediate access to a number of free title updates that include new monsters, quests, gear and more.


Enjoy an exciting new storyline set in Kamura Village
This serene locale is inhabited by a colorful cast of villagers who have long lived in fear of the Rampage - a catastrophic event where countless monsters attack the village all at once. 50 years after the last Rampage, you must work together with the villagers to face this trial.


Experience new hunting actions with the Wirebug
Wirebugs are an integral part of your hunter’s toolkit. The special silk they shoot out can be used to zip up walls and across maps, and can even be used to pull off special attacks unique to each of the 14 weapon types in the game.

Buddies are here to help
The Palico Felyne friends you already know and love from previous Monster Hunter adventures are joined by the brand new Palamute Canyne companions!

Wreak havoc by controlling monsters
Control raging monsters using Wyvern Riding and dish out massive damage to your targets!

Fend off hordes of monsters in The Rampage
Protect Kamura Village from hordes of monsters in an all-new quest type! Prepare for monster hunting on a scale like never before!

monsterhunterrise_sunbreakdeluxekit.human_name: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak Deluxe Kit
monsterhunterrise_sunbreakdeluxekit.description_text:
Enjoy a bundle of great additional content:

• "Dragonsbane" hunter layered armor set
• "C Hound" Palamute layered armor set
• "F Devout" Palico layered armor set
• "Take Aim" gesture set (4 gestures)
• Fight Pose Set (3 poses)
• "Elegant Eyes" makeup
• "Fluffy Curls" hairstyle

Note: Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities. The additional content included in this Deluxe Kit is the same as that included in the Deluxe Edition. Monster Hunter Rise required; can be used without purchasing Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak.

We are opening doors that were once closed by T1D diagnosis.
